title: Chapter 2528 - Chapter 2528: Chapter 2528-Killing His Way To Hunyuan Heavenly Domain
body:
Chapter 2528 - Chapter 2528: Chapter 2528-Killing His Way To Hunyuan Heavenly Domain

Chapter 2528: Chapter 2528-killing his way to Hunyuan heavenly domain

Lu Ming blocked the path of retreat of the two peak heavenly emperors from the evil god tribe. His long spear swept across the sky and headed toward the two of them.

Previously, the three peak heavenly emperors were no match for Lu Ming. Now that there were only two left, they were even more outmatched.

Although the two of them tried their best to resist and counterattack, under the pressure of Lu Ming’s long spear, the two of them continued to retreat. They spat out blood and their bodies cracked.

“Go, quickly go!”

“Go report to the king!”

The other members of the evil god tribe did not dare to stay any longer. Regardless of their cultivation, they all ran for their lives. For a moment, not a single one of them was left in the huge military camp.

Bang!

One of the peak-stage heavenly emperors of the evil god tribe was struck in the shoulder by Lu Ming. Half of his body exploded and he was sent flying.

“Kill!”

One of the evil god race members was severely injured. Lu Ming had his eyes on the last evil god race member. His blood and Qi were in turmoil, and the power of domination filled the air. Lu Ming’s courage was unparalleled. With the support of the ‘battle character formula’, any random move he made was filled with terrifying combat power.

Pfft!

The peak-stage heavenly Emperor from the evil god tribe was unable to block it. His head was pierced through by the spear and he died on the spot.

Then, Lu Ming charged toward the injured evil god tribe member.

Without a doubt, the evil god tribe member was also killed by Lu Ming.

Since then, the three peak heavenly emperors who were guarding the evil god tribe’s military camp had all died at Lu Ming’s hands.

“The heavens…”

The beings of the heaven realm were all dumbfounded.

He had killed three peak heavenly emperors by himself.

These were peak heavenly emperors. Every one of them stood at the peak of the world. Every one of them was a true Big Shot. However, three of them had died at once.

The impact of watching three peak heavenly emperors die in front of them was extremely shocking.

They couldn’t react in time.

It was only when Lu Ming stepped forward into the evil god tribe’s military camp and was about to disappear that they came to their senses.

When he finally reacted, he was extremely excited.

That was because the camp of the non-human race had been breached!

quick, go back and tell them that the camp of the non-humankind has been broken through. Let the Army come here and fight to the Hunyuan heavenly realm!

we can take back the Hunyuan heavenly realm now. Hurry!

All of the heaven realm beings seemed to have gone crazy and were extremely excited.

Since the ancient war, the nine heavenly regions of the heaven realm, except for the Tai Qing heavenly region, had been occupied by the alien races.

Now, they finally had a chance to take back the Hunyuan heavenly realm. Naturally, they were excited.

Buzzzzzz! Whoosh!…

One figure after another flew toward two world city.

Two world city, like the royal city, was heavily guarded. The formation was activated.

Very quickly, those people returned to two world city.

quick, quick, report to the heavenly venerates. Send the Army to attack the Hunyuan heavenly realm. We must take it back!

“Hurry, hurry up!”

The living beings of the heaven realm all cried out.

The people in two world city looked at them as if they were fools.

“Are you crazy? take back the Hunyuan heavenly realm? There are countless powerful beings stationed in the evil god tribe’s military camp. How do we take them?”

“Did you guys receive some kind of shock?”

The people in two world city were speechless.

no, the evil god tribe’s military camp has been breached. Three peak heavenly emperors from the other party have died, and the rest have escaped. Now is a good time!

Someone shouted.

“Really? Three peak heavenly emperors have died, and you’re all just bragging!”

The people in two world city obviously did not believe him.

Peak heavenly emperors were not cabbages. There were not many of them in the entire heaven realm and the evil god Realm. How could they die so easily? it’s true. I have to report this to the various exalted Celestials!

At this moment, a tall and sturdy old man came up to them. He was quite dignified.

” Heavenly Emperor Liu Yun!”

Many people in two world city were shocked when they saw the old man.

Heavenly Emperor Liu Zheng was a veteran heavenly Emperor who had been guarding two world city in the past and had a lot of prestige.

“Could it be that what they said was true?”

Then, when they thought of this, their eyes revealed a look of horror.

Heavenly Emperor Liujia probably wouldn’t say such things.

Thump! “BOOM!”

Many people’s hearts started to beat faster. If this was true, it would be a big deal.

“Quickly report to the various exalted Celestials!”

Some people rushed towards two world city.

Before long, at least a dozen figures arrived on the city walls of two world city. These people were all peerless experts who were guarding two world city.

Every one of them was a four-star heavenly Emperor or above. There were even two peak heavenly emperors.

” Liuqian, what happened? Is what you’re saying true?”

A peak heavenly Emperor asked.

my Lord, it’s true. We saw that the evil god tribe’s camp has been broken through and three peak-stage heavenly emperors have been killed. Now is the best time to attack the Hunyuan heavenly realm!

Celestial Emperor Liujia said.

“Who’s going to attack? Which unrivaled expert?”

A peerless expert asked. Even with their temperaments, they were still greatly shocked.

“Lu Ming, it’s Lu Ming!”

Someone immediately shouted.

“What? Lu Ming?”

The dozen or so peerless powerhouses were all greatly shocked.

“Lu Ming is alone?”

Someone asked.

that’s right. It’s Lu Ming alone. He broke the evil god tribe’s formation and killed three peak emperors on the spot. He’s already in the Hunyuan heavenly region!

Celestial Emperor Liujia said.

Hiss… Hiss…

The people present gasped.

Lu Ming had single-handedly broken through the alien tribe’s formation and killed three peak heavenly emperors. What a shocking achievement was this?

How amazing was Lu Ming’s combat strength?

Previously, some people had speculated that Lu Ming’s strength had already reached the peak of the heavenly Emperor realm. However, they now knew that they had underestimated Lu Ming.

sound the drums! Gather the Army and follow me to the Hunyuan heavenly realm!

One of the top powers took a deep breath and gave the order!

Thump! Thump! Thump!

A deafening boom was heard in two world city. The war drums were sounded, and countless cultivators flew towards the city walls.

“What’s going on? Don’t tell me the alien races are attacking!”

“Is the final battle coming?”

Many people were puzzled.

” Let’ s go, follow me to the camp of the outsiders!’1

A peak heavenly Emperor took the lead and flew out of two world city.

Although many people were confused, they did not question the military Order and flew out of two world city.

Countless voices blotted out the sky as they charged toward the evil god tribe’s military camp.

When they arrived at the evil god tribe’s military camp and saw the ruins and the huge spear mark that was millions of miles long, they were all deeply shocked.

The evil god tribe’s military camp had been breached, and the evil god tribe was completely empty.

“It’s Lu Ming…”

Very soon, the news of Lu Ming breaching the evil god tribe’s military camp spread throughout the entire Army. Everyone was shocked.

“Kill, kill our way over!”

we’ll kill our way to the Hunyuan heavenly realm and take it back!

“Kill! Hahaha!”

Then, the morale of the heaven realm beings was greatly boosted. They rushed past the evil god tribe’s camp and attacked the Hunyuan heavenly region.

Wherever they went, they saw corpses of the evil god tribe.

Clearly, these were all killed by Lu Ming.
